body: [TerminateWorkflowExecutionRequest](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal-proto/blob/a404bd24bd395a026e19b2dcc48832cedd06fa44/temporal/workflowservice/v1/request_response.proto#L394) has `details` and `reason` fields but [RequestCancelWorkflowExecutionRequest](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal-proto/blob/a404bd24bd395a026e19b2dcc48832cedd06fa44/temporal/workflowservice/v1/request_response.proto#L330) doesn't. To keep parity these fields needs to be added and supported by CLI (at least `reason`).
title: Add reason and details to RequestCancelWorkflowExecutionRequest
